trans-unit.note: You are reading the ".properties" entry. The exclamation mark can also mark text as comments. The key characters =, and : should be written with a preceding backslash to ensure that they are properly loaded. However, there is no need to precede the value characters =, and : by a backslash. string_key
The backslash below tells the application to continue reading the value onto the next line. message

trans-unit.source: This is the value that could be looked up with the key "key with spaces".
trans-unit.target: Це значення, яке можна було б побачити ключем "ключ з пробілами".
trans-unit.note: Add spaces to the key key with spaces
If you want your property to include a backslash, it should be escaped by another backslash path
